foods.name: Margherita Pizza
foods.description: Classic pizza with tomato sauce, mozzarella cheese, and fresh basil.

foods.description: Delicious pizza topped with spicy pepperoni and mozzarella cheese.

foods.description: Juicy beef patty with melted cheese, lettuce, tomato, and special sauce.

foods.description: Crispy chicken fillet with fresh lettuce, tomato, and mayonnaise.

foods.description: Crisp romaine lettuce, parmesan cheese, croutons, and Caesar dressing.

foods.name: Greek Salad

foods.description: Crispy tempura shrimp rolled with rice and seaweed, served with wasabi.

foods.description: Layers of pasta, rich meat sauce, and creamy cheese baked to perfection.
